mapper.select: SELECT FIELD_RES_ID, FIELD_RES_AT, FIELD_RES_MATCH_AT, FIELD_RES_PAY_AMOUNT, FIELD_RES_PAY_AT, STADIUM_TIME_ID1, STADIUM_TIME_ID2, TEAM_ID, FIELD_CODE_ID, MATCH_INWON_ID, STADIUM_TIME_AT, STADIUM_TIME_AT, TEMP_TEAM_NAME, FIELD_REG_NAME, FIELD_REG_PRICE, FIELD_REG_GARO, FIELD_REG_SERO, STADIUM_REG_NAME, MATCH_INWON_TYPE, STADIUM_REG_ADDR, STADIUM_REG_DETAILED_ADDR, HOME_MATCH_CANCEL_ID FROM FIELD_RES_VIEW WHERE FIELD_RES_PAY_AT IS NOT NULL
